definition: countermeasure for dealing with a situation
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

policy/plan/scheme/bamboo slip for writing (old)/to whip (a horse)/to encourage/riding crop with sharp spines (old)/essay written for the imperial examinations (old)/upward horizontal stroke in calligraphy
The higher ups have policies while the lower downs have their own ways of getting around them. (idiom)
pinyin: shang4 you3 zheng4 ce4 , xia4 you3 dui4 ce4

definition: Treatise 134 BC by Han dynasty philosopher Dong Zhongshu 董仲舒

sentences.english: Lastly certain countermeasures to the development of higher education service industry in Jilin Province are proposed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对吉林省发展高教服务产业提出了对策建议。

sentences.english: This article explains the problems and countermeasures of the examples in CNKI system.
sentences.chinese: 指出了CNKI系统中存在的问题及对策。

sentences.english: He also puts forward some countermeasures for China coal industry in heavy chemical industry period.
sentences.chinese: 提出了重化工业时期我国煤炭工业应采取的对策。

sentences.english: The main factors influencing precipitation of electrophoretic coatings and their solving methods are given in this article.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了影响电泳漆沉淀的主要因素和采取的对策。

sentences.english: At last it puts forward the countermeasures to the development of tea industrialization in Ying Shan County.
sentences.chinese: 最后一部分重点探讨英山县茶叶产业化发展的对策。

sentences.english: The third part is countermeasures and suggestions to English education in kindergarten of Huhhot.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是呼和浩特市幼儿园英语教育对策及建议。

sentences.english: The ecological implication of this life history strategy of rice water weevil was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中讨论了双季稻区稻水象甲生活史对策的适应意义。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the happen of nurses' injuries caused by sharp instruments and the preventive countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨锐器伤的发生情况与防范对策。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is the countermeasure of community education resource development.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是社区教育资源开发的对策研究。

sentences.english: Mediation priority, early prevention, public power dominant the social security are essential Countermeasure.
sentences.chinese: 让公权力主导社会安全的理念深入人心是基本对策。

sentences.english: Establish train of thought of benefit first sale, variable quantity for benefit model countermeasure.
sentences.chinese: 树立效益第一的营销思路，变数量型为效益型的对策。

sentences.english: For the HVDC power transmission project from the Three Gorges Hydropower Station to Guangdong an appropriate ice-melting countermeasure should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 三广直流工程的直流线路必须考虑合适的防冰对策。

sentences.english: At last, some detailed solution is proposed to perfect the administration legislates.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对完善行政立法提出了具体对策。

sentences.english: In view of the above, this text proposes some countermeasures to realize conformity of the city function in the capital-circle.
sentences.chinese: 据此提出促进首都圈内各城市职能整合的几点对策。

sentences.english: Many experts have been called in for advice.
sentences.chinese: 许多专家被请来商量对策。

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and countermeasure of tracheomalacia in thyroidectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨甲状腺切除术中气管软化的诊断及对策。

definition: lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
